Can‚Äôt imagine how good it must feel to be a vandy fan.  Only 2 back to back winning seasons in the past 50 years.  And they have never had a double digit winning season in the 123 years they‚Äôve been playing football.   They‚Äôve just historically been a bad football program.
In the early 1900s we were dominant but seasons weren‚Äôt 10 games back then.  And yes being a Vandy fan is painful

There is something amazing about having spent the last 27 years rooting for this team, letting my students enjoy mocking me when they find out I'm a Vandy fan, having a very rough couple of weeks on a personal level, and getting to sit and enjoy this. My entire four years there, we won 12 games. Total. And the Titans are an embarrassment so Sundays are meh. It's nice to have some fun on Saturdays.
In vandys defense, they have very high academic standards and a lot of top recruits don‚Äôt qualify.

Last updated: 2025-09-27 18:55 UTC   Users with multiple flairs splits their vote equally between flairs.
paperbag is used for unflaired users.
To vote in the Fan Poll simply include the name of the team you think will win enclosed by {} as part of your TOP LEVEL comment discussing the matchup.
Check here for a list of all valid/known team names/aliases
To change your vote just edit your initial comment to bracket the other team. You can change your vote as often as you like until the GAME THREAD is posted.
The vote tally logic only counts the first comment it finds with a valid vote per user.

Maybe I'm wrong, and I don't listen to podcasts about Vandy, or anything like that, just watch them every week, and also will note that I usually watch them in multi view.  I've been a fan sense I was 6. I know I'm looking a gift horse in the mouth with Lea, but isn't he supposed to be a defensive minded coach? He was a DC at Notre Dame. It seems like sense he took over the defense has been straight cheeks. NDs defense got better when he left, and Freeman took over. Like I said, I'm loving the ride, but could this whole team just be Jerry Kills success?  Please football gods don't spite me for questioning.
Defense has looked good to me? The South Carolina game? They‚Äôd be doing good today if they limited the penalties.
We held Tech for -8 yards for the 2nd half until their last drive, and beat SC 31-7 at SC‚Ä¶. The defense has been more than fine

Defense hasn‚Äôt looked great today, but this Utah State team also has been putting up good offensive numbers. They also got left out on the field way too long a couple of times.

I‚Äôm not very knowledgeable either but I‚Äôve seen a lot of criticisms of his coaching as well. I think he did improve our defense but ultimately I agree, I think the team‚Äôs success is largely because of the NMSU coach and player transfers. Without that I think Lea would be getting nearly as many praises.
